sentences.en: Prices range from $119 to $199, depending on the particular configuration.
sentences.cn: 价格根据配置的不同从119美元到199美元不等。

sentences.en: The precise configuration of a heat island depends on several factors.
sentences.cn: 热岛的精确结构取决于几个因素。

sentences.en: If this is the initial configuration, the server should not be running.
sentences.cn: 如果这是初始配置，则服务器不应该在运行。
